item.description:
Lei is just one mountain away from becoming the first Chinese woman, as well as the first Asian American woman, to climb the highest mountain on every continent and to ski to both the North and South Poles (the “7+2”). Join Lei as she holds a last party before she heads out to climb Mount Everest in March!

Listen to some great music, watch expedition photo exhibits, catch up with friends and get entertained by a comedian! Free salsa lessons and dancing after 9pm if you stay.

The location is near downtown crossing in Boston

Service: Food, Cash bar, Raffle prize.

Time: 7 - 9 pm and you can remain after.

Raffle Prizes sponsored by (and more cool gadgets to come!):
La Sportiva
Nemo
Granite Gear
Princeton Tec
Kahtoola
Vasque

Everyone is welcome. Please help invite more friends and bring guests.

Please RSVP online to help us plan for the food and service.

Suggested donation $20 at door. Money raised from the donations supports the Evest expedition.

Can’t Make it? You can contribute online at www.LeisVentures.com.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Climb to the Top! Mount Everest Party Mixer & Fundraiser
